name: Space Mapper
tagline: An Android App for Studying Human Mobility and Activity Spaces
body: Space Mapper is a mobile phone app that collects information about the spaces we move through as we go about our daily activities. It is being used by researchers at Princeton University and the Center for Advanced Studies of Blanes (CEAB-CSIC) to study human mobility and social inequality.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
